description:
This Course is designed to give you a Quick & Effective way to Understand the Insights of CRM and understand the Consulting Aspects of it, investing few minutes in this course you will have a thorough knowledge on CRM Consulting Keypoints , you will be able to Understand & Implement CRM requirements Successfully & Efficiently.

This is a self-paced, video-based course and you will learn best practices for getting started , by an hour you can complete the course.

The Course is divided into 6 Sections . ie

1)Course Introduction 2)CRM intro 3) CRM Benefits 4)CRM Implementation & Creation

5)CRM - Picking Right Resources & Evaluation 6)CRM Future & Useful Resources

This Course Will be useful for :-

Business Owners

Business Students

Start Ups

Anyone interested in CRM & Consulting.

Anyone looking to Evaluate CRMs

Managers

Existing Business looking to explore the power of CRM & Grow
title: CRM Consulting Essentials & Best Practices
